com.qbpsimulator.engine.interfaces

Interface IResourceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceManager

    public interface IResourceManager
    Interface describing Resource Manager actions.
    Author:
    Madis Abel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyActivitiesEnabled(ProcessActivity[] enabledActivities)
      Starts activities that have enough resources available.
      void notifyResourceAvailableFromActivity(ProcessActivity processActivity)
      Notify the resource manager that resources used by activity are a
      void notifyResourcesAvailableFromProcess(ProcessInstance processInstance)
      Frees all resources allocated by a process instance

    • Method Detail

      • notifyActivitiesEnabled

        void notifyActivitiesEnabled(ProcessActivity[] enabledActivities)
                      throws BPSimulatorException
        Starts activities that have enough resources available. Queues remaining ones.
        Parameters:
        enabledActivities - list of enabled activities
        Throws:
        BPSimulatorException

      • notifyResourceAvailableFromActivity

        void notifyResourceAvailableFromActivity(ProcessActivity processActivity)
                                  throws BPSimulatorException
        Notify the resource manager that resources used by activity are a
        Parameters:
        processActivity - process activity that was completed
        Throws:
        BPSimulatorException

      • notifyResourcesAvailableFromProcess

        void notifyResourcesAvailableFromProcess(ProcessInstance processInstance)
                                  throws BPSimulatorException
        Frees all resources allocated by a process instance
        Parameters:
        processInstance - process from where to make resources available
        Throws:
        BPSimulatorException
